original_text: The ten horns show that ten kings will rule that kingdom. After them, another king will come to rule. He will be different from the other kings. He will get power over three kings. The ten horns show that ten kings will rule that kingdom. After them, another king will come to rule. He will be different from the other kings. He will get power over three kings.
korean_text: 그 열 뿔은 그 나라에서 일어날 열 왕이요 그 후에 또 하나가 일어나리니 그는 먼저 있던 자들과 다르고 또 세 왕을 복종시킬 것이며

sentences.original_text: that ten kings will rule that kingdom
sentences.korean_translation: 열 왕이 그 나라를 다스릴 것이라는 것을

sentences.original_text: another king will come to rule
sentences.korean_translation: 다른 왕이 다스리기 위해 올 것입니다

sentences.original_text: He will be different from the other kings
He will get power over three kings
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 세 왕에 대한 권력을 얻을 것입니다
